SKT_FIRST.name: Ballad of a Soldier
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2</color> turns. This effect ignores the target's <color=#28d9ed>Effect Resistance</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000073_1_1]</color> chance to inflict Burned on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000073_1_1] turn(s)</color>. This effect ignores the target's Resilience.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다. 대상을 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 화상 상태로 만듭니다.\n대상이 지속성이라면 추가로 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 화상 상태로 만듭니다.\n이 효과는 대상의 효과 저항을 무시합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵を攻撃します。<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>2</color>ターンの<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を付与します。この効果は対象の<color=#28d9ed>効果抵抗</color>を無視します。

SKT_SECOND.name: Paths of Glory
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Detonates all Burned stacks on the target, and increases damage dealt by detonation by <color=#28d9ed>50%</color>. Increases damage dealt to Earth targets by an additional <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases damage\nEnhances Detonation on Earth targets
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: ダメージUP\n地属性に与える破裂ダメージ強化

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Increases Burned duration by 2 turns when detonating
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 破裂時、火傷+2ターン追加

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nReduces Apocalypse Now cooldown by 2 turns
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n【地獄の黙示録】のスキルターン\n-2ターン

description: Attacks all enemies. Detonates all Burned stacks on the target, and increases damage dealt by detonation by <color=#28d9ed>50%</color>. Increases damage dealt to Earth targets by an additional <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. 대상의 화상을 모두 폭발시키며, 폭발에 의한 피해는 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 증가합니다. 지속성 대상의 경우 추가로 피해량이 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。対象に付与された火傷をすべて破裂させ、破裂のダメージが<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>UPする。敵が地属性の場合、破裂のダメージが追加で<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPする。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Apocalypse Now
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Burn</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color> (applied twice). This effect ignores the target's Effect Resistance; on kill, the cooldown is reset. For each target hit, increases own <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies. Inflicts Burned on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000073_3_1] turn(s)</color> (Applied 2 times). This effect ignores the target's Resilience, and resets cooldown when an enemy is defeated.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 화상 상태로 만듭니다. (2회 적용) 이 효과는 대상의 효과 저항을 무시하며, 적 처치 시 쿨타임이 초기화됩니다.\n피해를 준 대상마다 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>가 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体を攻撃。対象を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>状態にする(2回適用)。この効果は対象の効果抵抗を無視し、敵を撃破するとスキルターンが初期化される。命中した対象1体ごとに、自身の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>増加。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color> : After attacking, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Burn</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color> with a probability of <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>. This effect ignores Effect Resistance.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Assist Effect</color> : After attacking, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Burn</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color> with a probability of <color=#28d9ed>70%</color>. This effect ignores Effect Resistance.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000073_chain_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000073_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000073_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict Burned on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000073_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr:
<color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color>을 부여합니다.
이 효과는 대상의 효과 저항을 무시합니다.

<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 적 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 화상을 부여합니다.
이 효과는 대상의 효과 저항을 무시합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェインスターター効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を付与。この効果は効果抵抗を無視する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>協攻効果</color>:攻撃後、敵対象に<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を付与。この効果は効果抵抗を無視する。
